boardgame.name: Magical Athelete
Magical Athlete
マジカルアスリート
魔法運動會
boardgame.description: A Japanese racing and sports competition game using athletes with special powers. The game is consistent with other games in the Grimpeur series in that it comes in a colorful small box and has modest components._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Game Summary_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players all start with seed money, used to draft a team of racers. The racers come out in random order, and each have a unique power (mostly modifying movement rules, sometimes giving extra pre- or post- race abilities). The draft is as follows: shift any unbought racers down one step on the board (decreasing prices as they shift), then add a new card to the display. If all spaces full, must buy one. After players have their racers (a few will remain out of game), there will be 4 or 5 races. For each race, players secretly simultaneously choose a racer. Then, in turn order, simply roll d6 and move your racer. Of course, special powers modify movement throughout the race._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The first 2 finishers score VP (more VP in later races); most VP after all races wins!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: OBG 89: We_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re All Such Good Sports

listing.notes: Z-Man Games (ZMG 4064) A Japanese racing and sports competition game using athletes with Anime art and special powers. The game is consistent with other games in the Grimpeur series in that it comes in a colorful small box and has modest components. Several Japanese websites have published better-looking and alternative power athletes for the game.

Zman Games - Magical Athlete Language: English Players: 4-5 Age: 10+ Duration: 60 to 90 min Weight: 0.530 kg New - mint condition - unopened - still in shrink wrap. Theme: A Japanese racing and sports competition game using athletes with Anime art and special powers. The game is consistent with other games in the Grimpeur series in that it comes in a colorful small box and has modest components. Several Japanese websites have published better-looking and alternative power athletes for the game. See Details (more info) or below for complete selling, payment and shipping conditions.
